post:
Happy birthday @CVPS_Chris

Just had to put this cool ad: (did you make it? **EDIT: He actually did!**)
![](http://s3.buysellads.com/1278603/127702-1347645524.gif)

**Here's the present:**
512 MB **dedicated** (hurr) RAM
20GB **RAID10** disk space
1000GB **premium** bandwidth
Chicago: https://billing.chicagovps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=12&promocode=birthdaycake
Buffalo: https://billing.chicagovps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=69&promocode=birthdaycake
Los Angeles: https://billing.chicagovps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=91&promocode=birthdaycake
**Atlanta**: https://billing.chicagovps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=170&promocode=birthdaycake

ChicagoVPS will also introduce two cool things soon...
Happy birthday to Chris and happy guessing to everybody on here!
